channel.title: Velvet Navy
channel.description: Relax in a world of velvet navy.

item.title: Brain Tour
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello everyone, I have decided to try a new ‘series’ here on velvetnavy called “Brain Tour” in which i go through things on my mind, current feelings, ten things to be happy about, and current cravings. I hope you enjoy this new post and let me know in the comments what you think and what… Continue reading Brain Tour

item.title: Mindfulness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Mindfulness is a brilliant way to wind down and remind yourself of the little things by bringing everything else into perspective. It is perfect for stress relief and a great positivity boost. It is often used as a therapeutic technique especially for people with anxiety. I am fairly new to actioning the concept of mindfulness… Continue reading Mindfulness

item.title: lists of autumn
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: It is no secret that i am absolutely in love with autumn. i also thoroughly enjoy (maybe strangely) making lists. Therefore i have collated some of the things that just make it amazing and what you can do to embrace this luscious time! Things i love about autumn: all the gorgeous colours like the oranges,… Continue reading lists of autumn

item.title: The little things that bring me happiness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello again! Since i was MIA for quite a while between my previous post and the one before that, i though i’d do another post now to make up for it. So i am making a list of all the things that are making me happy right now, it’s a little bit like the ‘my favourites… Continue reading The little things that bring me happiness

item.title: Siana’s food book
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello! I’m sorry for the lack of a post for a while but as you can expect from a year 10 (now 11), I was nose deep in revision for mocks and songs to learn for concerts etc. and soon after, had a relaxing holiday break. Goodness knows how i’ll get along next year..… Continue reading Siana’s food book

item.title: My favourites recently
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello, this time i have decided to do my recent favourites, be sure to look around velvetnavy after reading this and take a look at my snapshots and social media sites which can be found on my about page. Anyway, enjoy:   Face masks It’s been so nice recently to just lay back and use… Continue reading My favourites recently

item.title: Makeup
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: One of my many interests is makeup, i have always loved it from a young age when i would watch my mum do her makeup and try to mimic her, putting on her lipstick or some of my own barbie makeup. However, ‘normal’ makeup isn’t the only thing i have been interested in, fairly recently… Continue reading Makeup

item.title: Art 101
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: My absolute favourite thing to do is most likely art so here i will be talking about some tips, art in school, experiences, favourite art types and pieces and much more. I hope you enjoy! Art styles: So there are MANY different types and styles of art like abstract, graphic, realism, cubism, pop art an loads… Continue reading Art 101

item.title: GCSE formulas and equations
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Since the government has decided to change the exam board, resulting in us students being forced to memorise every equation and formula for science and maths, I decided to give my younger readers and myself a head-start by laying out all (i think) of the equations and formulas needed for you in GCSEs. physics: W… Continue reading GCSE formulas and equations

item.title: random tips, tricks and hacks
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello there, once again I am back with another blog post – shiny and new. My brother is a web designer and has very kindly made my blog much more professional for me so i hope you like the new look, not that it’s much different from the other.
